categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Mother" was the codename of a Duros female operative in the Rebel Alliance. Working out of Yavin Base, the Rebel's hidden fortress on the moon Yavin 4, she was responsible for recruiting her fellow Duros Vendri DeRalm as a scout for the Alliance around 0 ABY. Instead of giving her real name, she only used her codename of "Mother" when contacting DeRalm.

"Mother" was mentioned in Vendri DeRalm's Character Folio included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game. The portion of the Folio which mentioned "Mother" was reprinted in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook.
